mapper.delete:
delete from t_performance_databus_planfee_day where ID in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT USERCODE, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE,0)) PAYREFFEE, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_CAR,0)) PAYREFFEECAR, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_NOCAR,0)) PAYREFFEENOCAR, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_ACC,0)) PAYREFFEEACC, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_HEA,0)) PAYREFFEEHEA , SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE,0)) NUMPAYREFFEE, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_CAR,0)) NUMPAYREFFEECAR, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_NOCAR,0)) NUMPAYREFFEENOCAR, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_ACC,0)) NUMPAYREFFEEACC, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_HEA,0)) NUMPAYREFFEEHEA FROM t_performance_databus_planfee_day WHERE USERCODE = #{userCode} and realPaydate >= str_to_date(concat(#{dateStart},'00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and realPaydate <= str_to_date(concat(#{dateEnd},'23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') group by usercode

SELECT SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE,0)) PAYREFFEE, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_CAR,0)) PAYREFFEECAR, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_NOCAR,0)) PAYREFFEENOCAR, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_ACC,0)) PAYREFFEEACC, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_HEA,0)) PAYREFFEEHEA , SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE,0)) NUMPAYREFFEE, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_CAR,0)) NUMPAYREFFEECAR, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_NOCAR,0)) NUMPAYREFFEENOCAR, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_ACC,0)) NUMPAYREFFEEACC, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_HEA,0)) NUMPAYREFFEEHEA FROM t_performance_databus_team_planfee_day WHERE teamcode = ( select p.teamcode from T_PERFORMANCE_DATABUS_SALELAW_PERSON p where usercode = #{userCode} ) and realPaydate >= str_to_date(concat( #{dateStart},'00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and realPaydate <= str_to_date(concat( #{dateEnd},'23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT
SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE,0)) PAYREFFEE, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_CAR,0)) PAYREFFEECAR, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_NOCAR,0)) PAYREFFEENOCAR, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_ACC,0)) PAYREFFEEACC, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_HEA,0)) PAYREFFEEHEA , SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE,0)) NUMPAYREFFEE, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_CAR,0)) NUMPAYREFFEECAR, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_NOCAR,0)) NUMPAYREFFEENOCAR, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_ACC,0)) NUMPAYREFFEEACC, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_HEA,0)) NUMPAYREFFEEHEA
SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_M_S,0)) PAYREFFEE, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_M_S_C,0)) PAYREFFEECAR, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_M_S_NC,0)) PAYREFFEENOCAR, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_M_S_A,0)) PAYREFFEEACC, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_M_S_H,0)) PAYREFFEEHEA , SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_M_S,0)) NUMPAYREFFEE, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_M_S_C,0)) NUMPAYREFFEECAR, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_M_S_NC,0)) NUMPAYREFFEENOCAR, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_M_S_A,0)) NUMPAYREFFEEACC, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_M_S_H,0)) NUMPAYREFFEEHEA
SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_Q_S,0)) PAYREFFEE, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_Q_S_C,0)) PAYREFFEECAR, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_Q_S_NC,0)) PAYREFFEENOCAR, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_Q_S_A,0)) PAYREFFEEACC, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_Q_S_H,0)) PAYREFFEEHEA , SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_Q_S,0)) NUMPAYREFFEE, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_Q_S_C,0)) NUMPAYREFFEECAR, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_Q_S_NC,0)) NUMPAYREFFEENOCAR, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_Q_S_A,0)) NUMPAYREFFEEACC, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_Q_S_H,0)) NUMPAYREFFEEHEA
SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_Y_S,0)) PAYREFFEE, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_Y_S_C,0)) PAYREFFEECAR, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_Y_S_NC,0)) PAYREFFEENOCAR, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_Y_S_A,0)) PAYREFFEEACC, SUM(ifnull(PAYREFFEE_Y_S_H,0)) PAYREFFEEHEA , SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_Y_S,0)) NUMPAYREFFEE, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_Y_S_C,0)) NUMPAYREFFEECAR, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_Y_S_NC,0)) NUMPAYREFFEENOCAR, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_Y_S_A,0)) NUMPAYREFFEEACC, SUM(ifnull(NUM_PAYREFFEE_Y_S_H,0)) NUMPAYREFFEEHEA
FROM t_performance_databus_planfee_day WHERE USERCODE = #{userCode}
FROM t_performance_databus_team_planfee_day WHERE teamcode = ( select p.teamcode from T_PERFORMANCE_DATABUS_SALELAW_PERSON p where usercode = #{userCode} )
and DATE_FORMAT(realPaydate,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 day ),'%Y%m%d')
